name: Brick Breaker (itch) (Swendo Games)
description: A simple game that everyone knows. Enhanced with lighting and shading. Try to break all the bricks without dropping the ball. This game is breakout replica. This game was made by Swendoz in 1 day with Unity Engine. Adobe Photoshop and Aseprite were used for drawings and images.  You can support me on Ko-fi. You can reach me on Twitter.  Feel free to comment :)
